name: Trailarr
description: Trailarr is an application to download and manage trailers for your Radarr and Sonarr libraries. It runs in the background like Radarr/Sonarr, checks if a trailer already exists for movies/series, downloads trailers and organizes them in the media folder, follows Plex naming conventions, and works with Plex, Emby, Jellyfin, etc. Features include customizable profiles, hardware acceleration support for AMD, Intel, and NVIDIA GPUs, beautiful responsive UI, and automatic trailer searching when not set in Radarr/Sonarr.
notes: Configuration is done through the web interface
Integrates with Radarr and Sonarr for trailer management
